definitions.definition: the day of the week after Tuesday and before Thursday
definitions.labels: (informal or North American English)(especially North American English)(British English)(British English)

examples.text: We'll discuss this at Wednesday's meeting.
We'll meet on Wednesday *(= next Wednesday)*.
We met on Wednesday *(= last Wednesday)*.
The museum is closed on Wednesdays *(= every Wednesday)*.
He was born on a Wednesday.
I always do yoga on a Wednesday *(= every Wednesday)*.
I went to Peru on Thursday, and came back the following Wednesday.
‘When did the accident happen?’ ‘It was the Wednesday *(= the Wednesday of the week we are talking about)*.’
Come back Wednesday week *(= a week after next Wednesday)*.

wordOrigin: Originally translated from the Latin for ‘day of Mercury’ Mercurii dies and named after the Germanic god Odin.
